name: Sentinel Expedition
description:
A trip to North Sentinel Island becomes tedious when an anthropologist and his wife discover an uncontacted indigenous civilization.  However, their lives will be put at risk when they discover something terrifying. ¡The tribe practices cannibalism!

protect your couple and try to not touch them. While time passes the player faces enemies, which are increasing in number and thus increasing the difficulty. 

GitHub repository: https://github.com/kellyes93/generationJam2

Game Interest documents:  https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_3cVAYnJ0X1E_FepZ6YpzsAIyF5xYkJA?usp=sha...
